snippet.title: SHAFTED - Gameplay Trailer - Coming to Steam (PC / Linux)
snippet.description:
Play the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2074530/SHAFTED/

SHAFTED is a QUICK resource management game. Build your mini mining colony. Optimize your mineral outputs. Strategically position your buildings with turn based tactics. Pay off your contracts or else you'll get SHAFTED.

Join the Discord: https://discord.com/invite/Eaf5UrHU2e 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/loochlabs
